pages.text: Placing down $(l:intro/impure_ash)Impure Ash$() on the ground in a proper circular formation creates a $(thing)Ritual Circle$(). These are the crux of the $(thing)ritualism$() branch, and as such, it is highly recommended that one stocks up on the stuff.$(br2)Instructions on how to create specific sized ritual circles come with the respective rituals' chapters.

pages.title: A Ritual Circle
pages.text: When completed, light the $(thing)Ritual Circle$() with $(item)Flint and Steel$() to begin the ritual.
